name: Sierra Dawn Campsud Citronella
description: Concentrated camp soap that uses essential oils from citronella, lavender and peppermint to help keep insects away.Essential oils of citronella, lavender and peppermint help deter insects.Scented products should be stored safely when in bear countryContains purified water and vegetable-based biodegradable anionic and non-ionic cleaning agents.Effective in hot or cold water – and salt water, too!No animal ingredients or petroleum oils.Note, even biodegradable soaps shouldn't be used in a natural water source. Use 60m away from streams or lakes. Waste water should be poured into a cat hole 15-20cm deep.
